attributes.title: I hate u
attributes.review: I got this app and all I see is Mexicans aren’t good there bad there drug dealers and more stuff as a Mexican child I feel disrespected that my culture and his saying bad things about us he’s done more bad things then us he’s taking peoples children

attributes.title: Scarily bad
attributes.review: This app destroyed my phone and stole my information! I was looking forward to getting updates from POTUS, but instead this app broke my phone. Everytime I try to exit out of the app, my phone shuts down.

attributes.title: ✨𝔇𝔦𝔰𝔤𝔲𝔰𝔱𝔦𝔫𝔤✨
attributes.review: When I opened the app I was greeted by a rotting Orange looking fellow 🤢 this man was the definition of an orange rotting 🍊🍊🍊 Honestly disgusting ✨✨✨ but anyway do not install this app this was a very very disturbing experience and I instantly threw up when I saw this Orange man please do not install for your safety ✨🍊✨🍊✨🍊✨✨

attributes.title: no
attributes.review: this app is absolutely DISGOSTANG it makes me want to throw up and jump out the window. delete it delete it delete it delete it delete it delete it delete it delete it delete it delete it delete it

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it took an hour to download. Once I was on the app it was difficult to navigate and caused my phone to repeatedly crash. 0/10 do not recommend

attributes.title: The worst app there ever was
attributes.review: When I got it it was crashing so much and I’ve re downloaded it and deleted it but every time there was something wrong with it and it is the worst app do not get this app.

attributes.title: One of the worst Apps ive ever made the mistake of downloading!!!
attributes.review: This app, singlehandedly, has convinced me not to vote for Trump. It wasnt the fact that he wears more bronzer than I did to prom, or the crude things he says like “grab her by the p*****”, or even his extreme incompetence. No, it was this app. Steve Jobs is rolling in his grave.

attributes.title: Horrible app!
attributes.review: I opened this app and it was disgustingly cluttered with junk! The app began to crash and I couldn’t open it without it closing every few minutes. Horrible app for a horrible person! ❤️

attributes.title: Gave me corona!!
attributes.review: I decided I would support our AMAZING president but this app took 3 months to download. When it finally popped up I started to get sick and now I have the ChInA ViRuS!1! I cannot believe our incredibly competent president would do such a thing. Love him tho 😋❤️✨😻

attributes.title: Trash just like him
attributes.review: I downloaded the app in order to view and be a part of his fandom. After further consideration I decided that this app was trash and so was he. Remember, if you vote for Trump again you are a white supremacists. Have a good day 🤠
